name: Fortnite: Graveyard Drift Quest Pack
summary:
After falling into darkness, only the Driftwalker remains. Corruption is taking over and the Graveyard Drift begins! Complete Quests to earn V-Bucks with the Graveyard Drift Quest Pack.

- Driftwalker Outfit w/ Styles
- Broken Fractal Wings Back Bling
- Corrupted Rift Edges Pickaxe
- Corrupted Tendrils Glider
- Graveyard Drift Quest Bundle: Unlock up to 2,000 V-Bucks as you complete Quests
